Package controller

Class AppointmentRecordController

  • java.lang.Object
    • dbConnection.JDBCConnection
      • controller.AppointmentRecordController
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    CommonUseHelperIfc, javafx.fxml.Initializable
    public class AppointmentRecordController
extends JDBCConnection
implements javafx.fxml.Initializable, CommonUseHelperIfc
    This class provides a data control flow between displaying appointment record view and database tables
